title: ET Now GBS 2024: Power sector racing ahead to meet demand
description: The performance of power sector PSUs in India has been impressive, with their share prices increasing by 2.5-3 times in recent years. The power sector is where the demand is growing, and the government is constantly evolving and implementing new initiatives.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
